name: Booger Bunnies
description:
Raise a gooey bunny thing in this weird virtual pet game!

  • Three different endings depending on battles won and how well you take care of your bunny: Good, neutral, and bad
  • Pit your bunny against strange and outlandish enemies
  • Feed your bunny gummies probably not safe for human consumption
  • Raise your bunny's stats by feeding and playing with them

The entire game is point-and-click, so you can play just using your mouse!

CREDITS:

Sound Effects by Manuel Saen

Music by pa_pasha

Everything else by me
